title: (12) NEW to Hobby SGC  T206’s  Sweet Cap Tougher Variations - For Sale

posts.post_title: (12) NEW to Hobby SGC  T206’s  Sweet Cap Tougher Variations - For Sale
posts.post_content:
Gents for sale are 12 new  to the hobby and freshly graded T206s out of an estate in PA.  All Sweet Caporal 350-460 subjects with VA, and NC factory except 1 Ny.. Prices are PayPal FF method. Add 8.50 for shipping. 

If someone wants all 12 cards I would discount $300 off  the total of $3665.. (discounted price would be $3365.00) otherwise I will sell individually with listed price below. 

Send me your email via PM with any inquiries .. Front scans will come in the next post reply by me.. 



1911 Sweet Cap. Neal Ball Cleveland SGC 6 $850

1911 Sweet Cap (350-460 fact 25 -24 district VA) Jeff Sweeney (NY ) SGC 4 - $350

1911 Sweet Cap (350-460 fact 25 -24 district VA) Buck Herzog (Boston) SGC 4 - $375

1911 Sweet Cap (350-460 fact 25 -24 district VA) Tom Needham SGC 2- $175

1911 Sweet Cap (350-460 fact 42 -4th district NC ) Mike Donlin (With Bat) SGC 3 - $175

1911 Sweet Cap (350-460 fact 42 -4th district NC ) Bill Bradley (With Bat) SGC 5 - $395
